item.title: Report X-2024060509
item.description:
Report X-2024060509

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-21T15:17:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-07
  • City: NASHVILLE
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Spill. Hazmat shipped fully regulated. 1oz lost from two of four 2.5L plastic bottles of Diversey Glance HC (sku 905779) due to loose cap closures. PLEASE NOTE: Four bottles were placed 2x2 in two UNPOP Y rated fiberboard boxes bundled together with tape; this package may have been erroneously processed with a 96 by origin station, which is why Unprocessed was selected. OVH scan at NASH.
